sync.title: Syncing Settings and Backup/Restore
sync.line1: Your settings are saved in your browser's local storage, and so they will be retained even after you quit the app.
sync.content: Since we don't require login/signup to use the app, there is currently no way to automatically sync your settings across devices. But if you're self-hosting Networking Toolbox, you can apply settings in your config, by including the following environment variables. This way, you're settings will be applied to all users across all devices.
sync.env_vars_description: Current environment variable values. Copy and paste into your config file for self-hosted instances.
sync.custom_css_description: Apply your custom CSS to your self-hosted instance by mounting a CSS file.
